About Germany's Debt Brake
What is the Debt Brake?

Germany's debt brake (Schuldenbremse) limits government borrowing to 0.35% of GDP. For SMEs, this principle can be applied as a conservative borrowing guideline.

How it Works

The calculator uses 0.35% of your annual revenue as a conservative debt limit, helping you maintain financial stability.

Benefits
  • Maintains financial discipline
  • Reduces default risk
  • Improves creditworthiness
  • Ensures sustainable growth
Important Note

This is a guideline tool. Consult with financial professionals for specific advice tailored to your situation.
